frontPages.TVRadioDR: Welcome to the Royal Danish Librarys DR-archive

facets.genresSubtitle: Choose which category you would like to search in

timeSearch.dateSubtitle: Pick a date you would like to see content from.
timeSearch.timeMachineSubtitle: Pick which period in DR's broadcasts you would like to search in.
timeSearch.searchCategoriesSubtitle: Pick a category and discover our broadcasts.

search.hitcount: result fund for | results found for
search.nohit: Sorry we didn't find any results matching this search "{query}"

nohitSubtitle.firstPart: We're sorry that it wasn't possible to find a result to your search. It isn't all broadcasts in the archive thats connected to good search words. So it might demand af few tries to find what you're searching. Maybe you have search for somehting thats not yet in the archive, or something we may not show.
nohitSubtitle.readMore: Read more about what the archive
nohitSubtitle.lastPart: We hope for your understanding and patience. We're working on making archive material more searchable. We have collected some good advice underneat, which might help you.

search.tipsTitle: A few tips for your search
search.mainCategories: Look further in our main categories
search.title: title

dataQuantity.firstPart: The curve shows how much DR-archive material you can search in the different years. In some periods there's a lot of material, in others there's less or nothing.
dataQuantity.secondPart: We work all the time to get more broadcasts ready for to be released in the online archive, therefore the curve will change according to how many broadcasts has been added.

placeholders.booksAndMaterials: Search title, author, journal, database etc.

searchGuide.title: Good advice for your search
searchGuide.subtitle: Maybe you can improve your search with these methods

second.line1: Check spelling. If you're unsure you can write ? as replacement for a letter - for example Son?a
second.line2: Then you'll search for both Sonia and Sonja

third.line1: Try writing * at the end of a word, for example skov*
third.line2: Then you'll search for skov, skovens, skovtur and so on

searchGuide.fourth: Use searching via date or periode om DR-archive's frontpage, if you got a sense of where the broadcast was sent

frontpageGuide.title: How do i search?
frontpageGuide.first: Søgefunktionen finder i udgangspunktet kun resultater, hvor dine søgeord fremgår i titel eller beskrivelse i lige præcis den form og stavemåde, du har skrevet dem. Det vil sige, at en søgning på eksempelvis hotel ikke vil finde resultater, hvor der står hoteller eller badehotel.
frontpageGuide.second: Hvis du vil inkludere flere former af søgeordene, kan du bruge * i slutningen og/eller starten af ordet.
frontpageGuide.third: Bemærk: Når du søger i søgefeltet, nulstilles dine evt. tidligere valg af filtre - eksempelvis kategori, kanal eller tid.
frontpageGuide.linktext: Læs flere gode råd om søgning

record.copyMessageFailed: The link was not copied to the clipboard. Copy the URL instead.

solr.notResponsive: There was an error in the system, that we're working to fix as soon as possible. We hope for your understanding and patience

infoError.title: There was an error
infoError.relatedContent: We could not find related content

auth.serviceFailed: The application's underlying services are not available at the moment - please try again later
auth.notAllowedHeader: UNFORTUNATELY YOU DO NOT HAVE ACCESS TO THIS CONTENT
auth.notAllowedText: It may be due to a broadcast is subject to copyright or clauses. For example due to vulnerable participants. Read more about

error.searchfailed: The search request could not be performed
error.malformeduri: Something went wrong with your search terms - try to change some of them

wrongUrl.header: Sadly we can not find the page you're looking for :(
wrongUrl.text: It is unfortunate because we got 25.000 TB websites in storage

hero.title: DR-archive
hero.subtitle: The Royal Danish Library
hero.explanation: I DR-arkivet finder du en stor mængde af DR's egenproducerede TV- og radioudsendelser fra 2006 og frem. Vi tilføjer løbende både nyere og ældre udsendelser, så arkivet bliver større og bedre
